events.title: Publication of 'On the Origin of Species'
events.description: Charles Darwin's groundbreaking work on the theory of evolution by natural selection was published.
events.significance: Revolutionized biology and our understanding of natural history.

events.title: Arrest of Lee Harvey Oswald
events.description: Lee Harvey Oswald was arrested for the assassination of U.S. President John F. Kennedy.
events.significance: Marked a critical moment in American history and led to intense investigations about the JFK assassination.

events.title: Launch of Soyuz 11 Spacecraft
events.description: Soviet Soyuz 11 spacecraft was launched, later becoming the first to board the world's first space station, Salyut 1.
events.significance: A pioneering mission in human spaceflight and space station habitation.

events.title: First Edition of The New York Times
events.description: The first issue of The New York Times newspaper was published.
events.significance: Became a major publication influencing journalism and public opinion in the US and globally.
